original_text: Then Jesus said to the man with the weak hand, ‘Lift up your hand.’ So the man lifted up his hand and it became well again. It was now as strong as his other hand.
korean_text: 이에 그 사람에게 이르시되 손을 내밀라 하시니 그가 내밀매 다른 손과 같이 회복되어 성하더라

sentences.original_text: to the man with the weak hand
So the man lifted up his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 남자는 자기 손을 들었고

sentences.original_text: It was now as strong as his other hand
